verses.name: Genesis 49:13
verses.text: Zebulun shall dwell at the haven of the sea; and he shall be for an haven of ships; and his border shall be unto Zidon.

verses.name: Genesis 49:14
verses.text: Issachar is a strong ass couching down between two burdens:

verses.name: Genesis 49:15
verses.text: And he saw that rest was good, and the land that it was pleasant; and bowed his shoulder to bear, and became a servant unto tribute.

verses.name: Genesis 49:16
verses.text: Dan shall judge his people, as one of the tribes of Israel.

verses.name: Genesis 49:17
verses.text: Dan shall be a serpent by the way, an adder in the path, that biteth the horse heels, so that his rider shall fall backward.
